name: basic0
prompt: The video opens with a view of a kitchen area, featuring a black round table in the foreground. On the table, there is a clear plastic container filled with yellow cereal and an empty white bowl. The kitchen has white cabinets, a stove, and various appliances visible in the background. A robotic arm, predominantly white with black joints, enters the frame from the right side. The robot's end effector, which appears to be a gripper, approaches the cereal container and begins to scoop cereal into the white bowl. The robot's movements are precise and controlled, indicating a programmed task. The video concludes with the robot successfully transferring the cereal from the container to the bowl, leaving the cereal container partially empty
